channel.title: CVE Feed for WPFactory -- Email Verification for WooCommerce
channel.description: The latest CVEs for WPFactory -- Email Verification for WooCommerce

item.title: CVE-2024-49305|2024-10-17T17:37:14.082Z -- wpfactory -- email%20verification%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in WPFactory Email Verification for WooCommerce allows SQL Injection.This issue affects Email Verification for WooCommerce: from n/a through 2.8.10.
